Sentencas: Exsolution of A-site and/or B-site dopants has been widely used to improve the electroactivity and coking resistance of the perovskite anode for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Efficient Ferrite-Based Perovskite Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with A-Site and B-Site Co-exsolution

Sentencas: Here, an A-site and B-site co-exsolved Ba0.3Sr0.7Fe0.9Mn0.1O3-delta(BSFM) perovskite is employed as the anode material of SOFCs.
Titulo: Efficient Ferrite-Based Perovskite Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with A-Site and B-Site Co-exsolution

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction results confirm that the cubic BSFM perovskite shows reasonable structure stability in hydrogen, although metallic Fe and SrO exsolve from the provskite lattice.
Titulo: Efficient Ferrite-Based Perovskite Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with A-Site and B-Site Co-exsolution

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy results find that a whisker-like species grows from the perovskite in addition to the exsolution of Fe nanoparticles.
Titulo: Efficient Ferrite-Based Perovskite Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with A-Site and B-Site Co-exsolution

Sentencas: It is verified by transmission electron microscopy-energy-dispersive X-ray spectroscopy that the whisker is composed of BaO and SrO. The surface enrichment of Ba and Sr elements is also proven by X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy.
Titulo: Efficient Ferrite-Based Perovskite Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with A-Site and B-Site Co-exsolution

Sentencas: The peak power densities of a single cell with the BSFM anode are 538 and 364 mW cm(-2) at 800 and 750 degrees C in hydrogen, respectively, while the polarization resistances of them are 0.18 and 0.28 Q.cm(-2) at the same conditions, respectively.
Titulo: Efficient Ferrite-Based Perovskite Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with A-Site and B-Site Co-exsolution

Sentencas: The cell operates stably for over 60 h in hydrogen with a current density of 0.2 A cm(-2).
Titulo: Efficient Ferrite-Based Perovskite Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with A-Site and B-Site Co-exsolution

Sentencas: However, the BSFM anode shows sluggish activity for methane oxidation.
Titulo: Efficient Ferrite-Based Perovskite Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with A-Site and B-Site Co-exsolution

Sentencas: With the addition of Ni to the BSFM anode, its activity for methane oxidation is remarkably improved, and the peak power density increases from 84 mW cm(-2) for the BSFM anode to 194 mW cm(-2) for the Ni-BSFM anode at 800 degrees C in methane.
Titulo: Efficient Ferrite-Based Perovskite Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with A-Site and B-Site Co-exsolution

Sentencas: The Ni-BSFM anode also exhibits excellent stability in methane and works stably for over 70 h with a current density of 0.2 A cm(-2).
Titulo: Efficient Ferrite-Based Perovskite Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with A-Site and B-Site Co-exsolution
